Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/Altgeld
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses temp rerouted via: California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, Kedzie, Logan Blvd, and California, near California/Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via:  California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, Kedzie, Logan Blvd, and California, due to, street blockage, near California/Altgeld.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
